name: lamb-api
description: Lamb API: Backend for the Wolf Online League Feed

scripts.tests: cd tests; docker build . -t nodejs-lamb; docker run nodejs-lamb
scripts.clean-start: rm -rf team; rm -rf store; echo 'RGAPI-df917278-ac1a-418e-b9ad-b062ac884f20' > apikey.txt; echo '{ "team_name": "Team Solar", "team_tag": "TS", "team_members": [ "Microwabe", "Starkiller645", "PickleoDaRicko", "Meema09", "SGB2006", "Telstar112", "keyboard spams" ] }' > config.json; git pull; node main.js
